notes: On 1 December 2023, Israeli forces clashed with unknown Palestinian militants and rioters during a raid in Shuwaykah suburb (Tulkarm, West Bank). The militants exchanged fire with the forces, while rioters threw rocks. Israeli forces fired live and rubber bullets, stun grenades, and tear gas canisters. There were no casualties.
On 1 December 2023, in Araguaina (Tocantins), two armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Maracana sector. The deceased had a police record for drug trafficking. 1 fatality.
On 1 December 2023, Russian military forces attacked the Ukrainian military, but were repelled near Hryhorivka, Donetsk. Casualties unknown.

actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
notes: On 30 November 2023, in Macapa (Amapa), a drug trafficking suspect exchanged fire with military police during a police patrol in the Perpetuo Socorro neighborhood. The drug trafficker was killed. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2023 (as reported), in Sao Jose dos Campos (Sao Paulo), members from rival drug trafficking groups exchanged fire. One suspect was shot and hospitalized. He ran away and was arrested in the state of Minas Gerais. A woman was also hit by a stray bullet during the clash and died. 1 fatality.
On 30 November 2023, SAF shelled artillery targeting RSF in Khartoum - Al Jarif West (Khartoum, Khartoum). Casualties unknown.
On 1 December 2023, Russian military forces shelled the Yunakivka community (coded to Yunakivka, Sumy). Casualties unknown.

On 30 November 2023, Katibat Tulkarm - Quick Response militants detonated an IED that was hidden underground targeting an Israeli military bulldozer in Tulkarm (Tulkarm, West Bank). No casualties occurred.
On 1 December 2023, Russian military forces shelled Plavni, Zaporizhia. There were no casualties.

On 1 December 2023, in Buthidaung town (Buthidaung township, Maungdaw district, Rakhine state), the Myanmar military stationed in Ah Lo Taw Pyae monastery at the town entrance fired heavy weapons and small arms around 12 pm for 30 minutes and hit the Myo Thit Basic Education Middle School at the town entrance. There were no casualties.

On 30 November 2023, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, hundreds of Conalep teachers held a protest at the congress to demand salary improvements and denounce irregularities by the General Director of the educational institution.

assoc_actor_1: PSL: Party for Socialism and Liberation
source: Liberation News; New York Daily News
notes: On 1 December 2023, about 200 pro-Palestinian protesters held a march from the New York Public Library to the New York Times building on Eighth Ave. in New York - Manhattan (New York) to call for a permanent ceasefire and support for Palestine in the wake of renewed fighting between Israel and Hamas. Later, thousands including members of the Party for Socialism and Liberation rallied in front of the New York Times building to demand an end to U.S. aid to Israel.

assoc_actor_1: Farmers (India); Former Government of India (2014-); SPP: Swabhimani Paksha Party
notes: On 1 December 2023, protesters of the Swabhimani Paksha Party led by a former MP held a sit-in protest outside the Rajarambapu Cooperative Sugar Mill in Walwa taluka (Sangli district, Maharashtra) demanding Rs 400 as the second installment of a grant for last year's sugarcane and Rs 3500 per ton as the minimum support price for the food crop produced this year.

assoc_actor_1: Refugees/IDPs (Palestine); Women (Palestine); PFLP: Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine
notes: On 30 November 2023, the women commission of the PFLP held a protest at the Yahya Skaff statue in Miniyeh (Al Miniyeh Al Danniyeh), in support of the Palestinian people in Gaza and the West Bank, and to denounce Israeli aggression towards them.

On 1 December 2023, members of Rainbow Action Against Sexual Minority Discrimination and Disability Discrimination Act of Solidarity in Korea (DDASK) held a press conference with a banner and picketed in front of the National Pension Service Disability Assessment Center (Seoul City - Songpa). They urged the authorities to recognize HIV-positive people as legally disabled.

On 30 November 2023, in Port-au-Prince - Petionville, Ouest, residents held a demonstration in Laboule 12 to decry the killing of young man by a military officer the day before (coded separately). Demonstrators burned tires on the road.
On 1 December 2023, Palestinian rioters clashed with Israeli forces during an Israeli raid in Bayt Fajjar town (Bethlehem, West Bank). There were no casualties.

source: PLO Negotiations Affairs Department; Quds News Network
notes: On 1 December 2023, Israeli settlers, under the protection of Israeli forces, raided Qaryut village (Nablus, West Bank) and clashed with Palestinians. Israeli forces fired at Palestinian farmers, injuring one of them. There were no fatalities.

On 30 November 2023, in Sucre (Chuquisaca), taxi cab drivers blocked different sectors of the city as a demonstration to voice their grievances about the new cab fares implemented by the local government. The drivers were deflating tires and threw rocks at police officers in Juana Azurduy de Padilla avenue near the second bridge, in Ravelo bus stop and near the airport. They clashed with officers at the second bridge. A total of ten taxi cab drivers were arrested.

source: Palestine News and Information Agency; PLO Negotiations Affairs Department
notes: On 1 December 2023, armed Israeli settlers, accompanied by Israeli forces, attacked Palestinian farmers and shepherds in Mosafer Yuta area east of Yuta town (Hebron, West Bank) and forced them to leave the land. There were no casualties.

Interception: On 1 December 2023, Hamas militants fired barrages of rockets toward central Israel, causing sirens to sound in Ramla (HaMerkaz) and surrounding areas. Not all of the rockets hit populated areas, as several were intercepted over the area of Ramla or fell in open areas.

Property destruction: On 1 December 2023, in Mya Kone village (Pale township, Yinmarbin district, Sagaing region), the Myanmar military raided the village and set fire to houses after clashing with the local People's defense force near the village (coded separately).

Non-violent activity: Around 1 December 2023 (as reported), the Clockwork Crew distributed antisemitic fliers in Los Angeles - Westside (California) with messages promoting Clockwork Crew (loosely affiliated with the Rise Above Movement).

Security measures: On 30 November 2023, joint security forces (coded as SSPDF) were deployed on the Wau to Kuajok road due to insecurity (location coded to Wau in Wau North, Western Bahr el Ghazal state) and an curfew on road usage from 6 pm to 6 am was also enforced.

Property destruction: On 30 November 2023, Israeli authorities forced 2 Palestinians to self-demolish their homes in Al Quds - Jabal al Mukabbir (Al Quds, West Bank) under the pretext of building without a permit.

assoc_actor_2: Shiite Muslim Group (Afghanistan); Hazara Ethnic Group (Afghanistan)
source: Afghan Islamic Press News Agency; AFP; Hasht-e Subh; Pajhwok Afghan News
notes: On 1 December 2023, 6-7 people including two Shiite clerics and four women, were killed and one was wounded following an attack by unknown gunmen on a rickshaw in the Kora Milli/Jibrail area near PD13 of Herat city. The victims were members of the Hazara minority. No group claimed responsibility for the attack.

source: Palestine News and Information Agency; PLO Negotiations Affairs Department; Quds News Network; Twitter
notes: On 30 November 2023, Israeli military forces shot and injured a Palestinian journalist south of Wadi Gaza (coded to Gaza - Nezarim) (Gaza City, Gaza Strip).
On 30 November 2023, FAMa and Wagner forces carried out an operation in Sokolo (Niono, Segou). One civilian was killed and another wounded.
Around 1 December 2023 (as reported), in Heroica Nogales, Sonora, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and parts of his body cover with a blanket. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2023, Wagner mercenaries abducted civilians during an air-landing operation by helicopter at the market in the village of Kikara (Douentza, Mopti). Several people were arrested. Those arrested were subsequently released.
